name: FlappyPong of the Death
description:
Algunha vez pensaches en como sería mesturar o clásico Pong co Flappy Bird? Pois agora podes desfrutar desta experiencia semi-hardcore-multibola, e cun estilo retro semellante ao da mítica Atari 2600.
A que esperas? É gratis!

Have you ever thought about mixing the classic game Pong and Flappy Bird? Well, now you can enjoy this half-hardcore-multiball experience, and whith an Atari 2600-like retro style.
What are you waiting for? It's free!
